author: nancymarinelli
body: A new analyzer has been deployed in Validation/RecoEgamma and a new sequence to be included in Configuration/StandardSequences/python/Validation_cff.py (also committed). The machinery is meant only for MC miniAOD. It has all been tested with "central" running using runTheMatrix.py --what standard -i all -l 1332 --command=' -n 200'
title: Mini aodvalidation:  V0
